entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1649
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1650
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1662
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1666
  • Update fix-grammar.ts by @juliandaz11 in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1670
  • Update improve-writing.ts by @juliandaz11 in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1668
  • Update change-tone.ts by @juliandaz11 in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1669
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1673
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1675
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1678
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1696
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1700
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1703
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1704
  • Minor changes on logo (more regular, smooth lines, png and svg favicon) by @datamoc in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1706
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1710
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1713
  • build(deps): bump follow-redirects from 1.15.3 to 1.15.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1711
  • Update project.json with cleaning and formatting by @RJohnPaul in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1705
  • fix(vite): fix .po file loader issue by @SergejKasper in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1716
  • [Bugfix] Save Pending Keyword Input by @CorreyL in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1721
  • fix(import): LinkedIn Profile.csv parsing fixes by @SergejKasper in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1717
  • Update profile.ts to add default values by @calumapplepie in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1714

New Contributors

  • @juliandaz11 made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1670
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1696
  • @datamoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1706
  • @RJohnPaul made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1705
  • @SergejKasper made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1716
  • @CorreyL made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1721
  • @calumapplepie made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1714

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.0.3...v4.0.4

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Removed caching from "resumes" which used to cause a lot of sync errors (users seeing outdated resumes)
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1725
  • fix(templates): Vertical-align-top instead of vertical-align-middle entry header data by @theschles in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1747
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1773
  • Update minimum node to 18.17.0 by @busches in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1795

New Contributors

  • @theschles made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1747

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.0.4...v4.0.5

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Instantiate Link with inclusive set to false by @CorreyL in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1727
  • [Feature] Keyboard Shortcut for Hyperlink by @CorreyL in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1729
  • fix(#1750): fixed downloaded PDF have issue(s) with Typography options by @Samrat-Saha-Sammy in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1751
  • fix(gengar template): link of personal project was overflowing outside. by @bhumit070 in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1768
  • fix(import): Changing 'Filetype' clears the 'File' upload field properly by @iammursal in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1771
  • modify the name field to a minimum of 2 characters by @tsp36 in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1785
  • Fix popover stacking in right sidebar theme section by @abizek in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1788
  • fix issue where PDF downloads fail on compose setup by @bennycornelissen in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1789
  • Better error handling and more lenient on the imported values by @gzsombor in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1790
  • fix(github_auth): fix GithubStrategy not searching for user using username by @mradigen in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1799

New Contributors

  • @Samrat-Saha-Sammy made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1751
  • @bhumit070 made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1768
  • @iammursal made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1771
  • @tsp36 made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1785
  • @abizek made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1788
  • @bennycornelissen made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1789
  • @gzsombor made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1790
  • @mradigen made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1799

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.0.5...v4.0.6

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1804
  • Add CommandList to Combobox component by @AmruthPillai in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1808

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed?

  • Upgraded to browserless/chromium version 2.
  • Added additional languages previously absent.
  • Implemented a donation banner on the main website page.
  • Refreshed package dependencies
